item.description:
St. Patrick's Day is nearing and Hartford is having a full blown St. Patty's Day extravaganza on Saturday, March 10th.  So come get your Irish on.

If you're planning to head out that weekend, Hartford is the place to be Saturday (New Haven is on Sunday). All the bars and clubs are open all day and there's also a parade. Huge bar hopping event.

Koji has invited me to come DJ there during the evening of the 10th, so I invite you to join. I'll be there from 4-8pm. So come start the evening off (or continue your afternoon lol) with some lounging, drinks, and maybe some dancing. Or just come to hang out - Koji is a really good spot for it. 

Hope you can join and hope to see you there. If you want to come say hey, I'll be in the DJ booth.
item.name: St. Patty's Day Celebration - Hartford
